LanguageData.Stone_Campfire.label: багаття обкладене камнями
LanguageData.Stone_Campfire.description: Cooks meals but produces less heat but more light, burns out slower than the standard campfire. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat. Refuelable.
LanguageData.Stone_Campfire_Blueprint.label: багаття обкладене камнями (креслення)
LanguageData.Stone_Campfire_Frame.label: багаття обкладене камнями (building)
LanguageData.Stone_Campfire_Frame.description: Cooks meals but produces less heat but more light, burns out slower than the standard campfire. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat. Refuelable.
